text: new subdivision employer medical mandates amend rsa by inserting after section the following new subdivision employer medical mandates employer medical mandates an employer that implements a medical mandate as a condition of an employee s continued employment shall develop a written policy outlining the details of the medical mandate and make such policy available to all employees the policy at a minimum shall a permit an employee to opt out of the medical mandate b permit an employer to terminate an employee who opts out of the medical mandate c require the employer to provide an employee who is terminated for opting out of the medical mandate with a monthly severance pay equal to of the value of the employee s total compensation at the time of termination and lasting for months total compensation shall include the employee s salary and any benefits the employee received while employed an employer shall submit a copy of the medical mandate policy to the commissioners of the departments of labor and employment security
